page.title: 10THE POST IN WIS. GREEN
page.content: The Royal Mail van delivers the mail to Wisborough Green Post Office at 6a.m. every morning. The three postwomen then sort the letters so that they are all in order for delivery.Each postwoman takes her bag of letters and packages on her post office bicycle and puts the letters through the letter boxes of the houses. One postwoman takes a bag of titbits to placate the dogs. The letters that are posted in the three postboxes in the village are collected twice a day. They are then sent to Redhill where they are sorted and sent on to their eventual destinations.
